<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 11"
    pfs=""
>
[Boots of Dancing](/Equipment.aspx?ID=600)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Cursed" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=274" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 90

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn shoes

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These boots act as [_greater boots of elvenkind_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=413), but they react wildly to strong physical exertion. While you wear the boots, the curse activates whenever you attempt an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check or Stride more than once in a single round during an encounter. The boots cast an 8th-level [_uncontrollable dance_](/Spells.aspx?ID=347) spell on you, and you automatically fail your save. Once the curse has activated for the first time, the boots fuse to you.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
